column4: anyone with tv-out in here make use of a "Intel Corporation Mobile 915GM/GMS/910GML Express Graphics Controller" video card?
sounds like mine,  what's the issue ?
it is possible that I don't know how to configure xorg.conf properly but...I don't seem to be able to output video or a "clone" of my desktop to my television screen (NTSC, us format)
do you use the 945, or the 915 chip for your video card?
I just checked my box and  I am using 865G , sorry,  I was mistaken
what dvd burning issue is this
I am unable to burn dvd's I get an "improper media type" error from k3b and nautalis
I won't say that is a persisting issue since I have never encountered it ,  are you suere you aer not tring to burn a dvd in a cd burner ?
positive, the burner says "dvd-rw dvd recordable"
and what are you putting in it ?
what does the media you want to burn to say ? what is written on it ?
fyi ,  4.7 gb dvd don'T actualy contain  4.7 gig of data,  more like 4.4
well I can't burn any amount of data on them period :(
DakotaSmith, others: thx for the help, but turns out I misread my drive, it is plus r....lol all that headache for nothing, I though all dvd burners in my house were -r...:)
ah, of couse, there is no better stage than the internet
